page.title: 17 RECREATION 1
page.content:
Rowhedge, Fingringhoe, and Abberton all have playing fields but the Rowhedge Rec is large enough for minor league football, enabling the Rowhehge Albion team to play in the Sunday league. The children can take part in Cubs, Brownies, Scouts,football Club, Sunday School, and Thursday Club. For teenagers the are Youth Clubs in both Rowhedge & Fingringhoe but these only open two nights a week. An old gravel workings behind Rowhedge - the pits is ideal for fishing and childrens adventure games. The river plays a most important role and there are yatch moorings and the Rowhedge Sailing Club with over 70 members
{**************************************
